subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: In his first appearance since breaking the N.H.L. career victory record, Martin Brodeur made 35 saves as the host Devils beat the Wild, 4-0, for his 101st shutout, two off the N.H.L. mark.devils ¶Chad LaRose and Matt Cullen each scored twice and the Carolina Hurricanes ran their home winning streak to seven, edging the Islanders, 5-4. isles.
